EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Partner.All.A.G.E.18202.Pricing Catalog Update POL.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: e-Bulletin: FN POL APJ Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> e-Bulletin: FN POL APJ Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update Dear Nokia Partners,
Updated FN POL Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs [including POL product pricing Quotation Tool] have been made available on the new Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://nokia.lightning.force.com/lightning/page/home]]> [Account ->Details -> Personal space links -> Partner Pricing folders] [for registered partners with updated price profiles] in mid-September 2017:
- Key Highlights:
- Generated with updated FN POL APJ pricing tool ed 3.1 [POL v01P05]. New POL Blue Print 3.0 solution Hardware and Sofware:
- Added maintenance pricing with 1st year warranty credit included - Added POL Small networks maintenance pricing - Modified BOM Quoting and focused it on Equipment - New Export Compliance related ECCNs extract
- Product Notifications: To receive notifications on product updates, manufacture discontinued dates and other product status changes, please subscribe to Notifications in OLCS (Nokia’s on-line customer support website). To receive notifications on partner price catalog updates, please subscribe to Notifications in Partner Portal/Partner Personal space.
For more information: Pricing information is available in Partner Personal folder on the New Nokia PRM Partner Portal. Please contact me should you have any questions.
Bogdan Vasilescu Nokia Global Partner Program and Sales Team Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
